ygData.subject: Re: The new enchantment spells
ygData.msgSnippet: Dear friends, I have seen that this mailing list dont generate any messages any more and my idea is to close it, if anyone wish to take a moderator status and
ygData.messageBody:
Dear friends,

I have seen that this mailing list dont generate any messages any more and
my idea is to close it, if anyone wish to take a moderator status and try
to get some life here in i will accept it discussion is open :)

To be sincerly i have started to play Asheron's call and my time is limited
so all time meditating wizard will never reach a lv 50 i think :) time to
get some fun as in old times :)

Before this list close you can ask me all what you want, (except i will not
post my foto with sheron stone :-) )

Silverion Dragonirder

High elf wizard (against all statistics eheheeh)
Fenin Ro

http://www.tip.it/wizard

moderator mailto:_EQ_magic@onelist.com
